resources.string: You have not entered a track and trace yet.
Enter your parcels by scanning the barcode in the receipt
You asked for it and now it\'s here: you can now receive alerts whenever one of your parcels has a status update.
Fixed bug preventing notifications to be displayed on certain devices.
Multiple items with same tracking code now allowed.
Option to choose theme from main menu.
Support for Correos Express removed due to the services being made private by Correos.
Implements new Services, which don\'t include Unit.
The app can track the parcel by location again.
App has been rewritten with a new architecture. Load times have been massively improved.
Due to the small number of donations the app now includes ads, which can be removed with Premium mode. If you have already made a donation, please get in touch!
This app has no affiliation with Sociedad Estatal Correos y Telegrafos, S.A. and has been created by an independent developer. It is free and open-source.
If you wish to contribute feel free to donate with a ko-fi:
Are you sure you want to remove the selected parcel?
Could not find any tracking with the given search.
Unfortunately, due to the costs of maintaining this app we\'ve had to incorporate ads. With a contribution of only %1$s you can remove them forever and contribute to the project.
